summary: AUTOMATIC SLIDING DOOR ON DRIVER'S SIDE DOES NOT OPEN AT ALL WHEN HANDLE IS USED.  MUST OPEN FROM INSIDE OR VIA REMOTE.  DOORS MAKE BUZZING SOUND INTERMITTENTLY ADVISING THAT DOORS ARE AJAR EVEN WHEN CLOSED  CONTACT PADS HAVE BEEN REPLACED, YET PROBLEM CONTINUES.  SOMETIMES DOOR WILL NOT CLOSE FULLY.  IT CLOSES, ATTEMPTS TO LATCH AND THEN RE-OPENS PARTIALLY. OTHER SLIDING DOOR HAS SIMILAR ISSUES TO A LESSER EXTENT.   LOTS OF OTHER DIVERSE ISSUES.
